query: ALTER QUOTA q1_01297, q2_01297 FOR 1 day TRACKING ONLY TO r1_01297;
alter table  ttl_test_02129 modify TTL (d + INTERVAL 1 MONTH) DELETE WHERE c=1 settings mutations_sync=2;
ALTER TABLE 02581_trips UPDATE description='b' WHERE id::UInt64 IN (SELECT (number*10 + 2)::UInt32 FROM numbers(10000000)) SETTINGS mutations_sync=2;
ALTER TABLE alter_01355 ADD COLUMN Added1 UInt32 FIRST;
ALTER TABLE alter_01355 MODIFY COLUMN Added2 UInt32 FIRST;
ALTER TABLE alter_01355 MODIFY COLUMN Added3 UInt32 AFTER CounterID;
ALTER TABLE alter_index_test ADD INDEX index_b b type minmax granularity 1 FIRST;

ALTER TABLE attach_partition_t2 ATTACH PARTITION tuple() FROM attach_partition_t1; -- { serverError BAD_ARGUMENTS } CREATE TABLE attach_partition_t3 (
	a UInt32,
	b String,
PROJECTION proj
(
SELECT
b,
sum(a)
GROUP BY b
)
)
ENGINE = MergeTree
ORDER BY a;

ALTER TABLE attach_partition_t4 ATTACH PARTITION tuple() FROM attach_partition_t3; -- { serverError BAD_ARGUMENTS } CREATE TABLE attach_partition_t5 (
	a UInt32,
	b String,
PROJECTION proj
(
SELECT
b,
sum(a)
GROUP BY b
)
)
ENGINE = MergeTree
ORDER BY a;
ALTER TABLE nested_table ADD COLUMN third Nested(e Int8, f String) FIRST;
alter table per_table_ttl_02265 modify TTL date + interval 2 month group by key set value = argMax(value, date);
alter table per_table_ttl_02265 modify TTL date + interval 2 month recompress codec(ZSTD(17));
ALTER TABLE recompression_table MODIFY TTL dt + INTERVAL 1 DAY RECOMPRESS CODEC(ZSTD(12)) SETTINGS mutations_sync = 2;

ALTER TABLE recompression_table_compact MODIFY TTL dt + INTERVAL 1 MONTH RECOMPRESS CODEC(ZSTD(12)) SETTINGS mutations_sync = 2; -- mutation affect all columns, so codec changes SELECT substring(name, 1, length(name) - 4), default_compression_codec FROM system.parts WHERE table = 'recompression_table_compact' and active = 1 and database = currentDatabase() ORDER BY name;

alter table shard_0.from_0 on cluster test_cluster_two_shards_different_databases move partition tuple() to table shard_0.to format Null settings distributed_ddl_output_mode='never_throw', distributed_ddl_task_timeout = 1;

alter table shard_0.from_1 on cluster test_cluster_two_shards_different_databases move partition tuple() to table shard_0.to format Null settings distributed_ddl_output_mode='never_throw', distributed_ddl_task_timeout = 1;
ALTER TABLE tab MODIFY COLUMN long_string MODIFY SETTING min_compress_block_size = 8192;
ALTER TABLE tab MODIFY COLUMN long_string RESET SETTING min_compress_block_size;
ALTER USER test_user_01075 HOST REGEXP '.*\\.anothersite3\\.com' HOST REGEXP '.*\\.anothersite3\\.org';
ALTER USER test_user_01075_x RENAME TO test_user_01075_x@'192.168.23.15';
ALTER USER test_user_01075_x@localhost RENAME TO test_user_01075_x@'%';
ALTER USER u1_01292@'%' HOST LOCAL;
ALTER USER u2_01292 DEFAULT ROLE ALL EXCEPT r2_01292;
ALTER USER u2_01292@'%.myhost.com' HOST ANY;
